lines.text: I'm gonna eat your lunch, you long-haired faggot!
Yeah, yeah. So we got off to a bad start. Well ya' know what it means when somebody like me gets off to a bad start? Not a God damn thing.
You know what a man would do right now if he were smart?
What?
I don't know, I thought you'd know.
I think I'm gonna screw miss Mary. Do you mind, Deke?
*I* mind!
You didn't seem to mind last night. In fact, you were begging for more.
Oh, yeah? Well that shows you how little I was getting.
Hey, Deke, it turns out Dingleberry here's a joke after all.

[quoting book]
"The murderer, is not unaccountable for his own murder. And the robbed should not be blameless for being robbed. For it is the cornerstone of the temple, that is no higher than the lowest stone in its foundation."
Now, don't start speaking in puns to me woman.
That is from a book, bozo! And, if you'd read once in a while, perhaps you'd know what I'm talking about!
Oh, books, Europe, Lear Jets, Sam Baker, shoplifting... you're pathetic!
Oh, I am, am I? Do you know what you are? A case of eye and hand co-ordination, and you're really not very good at that!

[in car speeding towards opening drawbridge]
Hey, wait a minute... why aren't we slowing down?

[laughs]
She doesn't know me very well, does she, Deke?
Not likely she ever will with about one second to live.

[in helicopter pursuing Dodge Charger]
I want 'em stopped.
Stopped, how?
I want 'em stopped, I don't give a good god damn if you gotta crash right into him. You hear me? 'Cause if you don't, you're gonna start screaming mayday, 'cause I'm gonna give it a try!
Keep going partner, 'cause my top end is unlimited!
Haul ass to Bucola!

[being chased by a police car]
What does he have under that hood?
The driver's no slouch either.
You know what? I think I'm finally ready to unload.

[walking through police garage]
Stevie! Stevie, ma boy! Where are ya?
Hey!
Where the hell's that car at?
[referring to high-performance police car]
Over here... but she ain't got any siren or lights yet.
Hey look, all I care about, is what you've got under that hood.
Take a look
[starts police car, car rumbles to life]

[smiles broadly]
So, what's my top end on this?
Unlimited.
I'm gonna stick right up your ass this time, buddy!
This ain't no dirt track, roundy-rounder.
So help me, if you try another stunt like that again, I'm gonna braid your tits.
